entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:17 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 4:53 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure: 99.2 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets and ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
